Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.xpath.ast

This package contains the base classes for implementing a Jaxen based XPath Abstract Syntax Tree.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
IAeXPathNodeVisitor This interface is implemented by visitors of the XPath AST.
IAeXPathQualifiedNode Interface implemented by xpath nodes that are qualified.
 

Class Summary
AeAbstractXPathAxisNode This class extends the basic xpath node and acts as a base class for any node that contains an axis.
AeAbstractXPathBooleanNode A base class that boolean xpath nodes extend (or, and, union, unary).
AeAbstractXPathNode A simple 'node' inner class.
AeAbstractXPathOperatorNode A base class for xpath nodes that have operators (equality, relational, additive, multiplicative).
AeAbstractXPathQualifiedNode A simple base class for XPath nodes that are potentially namespace qualified.
AeXPathAbsLocPathNode An XPath node for an absolute location path.
AeXPathAdditiveExprNode An XPath node for additive expressions.
AeXPathAllNodeStepNode An XPath node for the all node step.
AeXPathAndExprNode An XPath node for an and expression.
AeXPathAST A class that wraps the XPath abstract syntax tree.
AeXPathCommentNodeStepNode A XPath node for a comment node step.
AeXPathEqualityExprNode An XPath node for an equality expression.
AeXPathFilterExprNode An XPath node for a filter expression.
AeXPathFunctionNode A simple node to represent a function call.
AeXPathLiteralNode A simple node to represent a literal.
AeXPathMultiplicativeExprNode An XPath node for a multiplicative expression.
AeXPathNameStepNode An XPath node for name step.
AeXPathOrExprNode An XPath node for an or expression.
AeXPathPathExprNode An XPath node for a path expression.
AeXPathPredicateNode An XPath node for a predicate.
AeXPathProcessingInstructionNodeStepNode An XPath node for a processing instruction node step.
AeXPathRelationalExprNode An XPath node for a relational expression.
AeXPathRelativeLocPathNode An XPath node for a relative location path.
AeXPathRootXpathNode An XPath node for a root XPath.
AeXPathTextNodeStepNode An XPath node for a text node step.
AeXPathTreeTraverser Used to traverse the XPath AST.
AeXPathUnaryExprNode An XPath node for a unary expression.
AeXPathUnionExprNode An XPath node for a union expression.
AeXPathVariableNode A node type that identifies as a variable reference.
 

Package org.activebpel.rt.bpel.xpath.ast Description

This package contains the base classes for implementing a Jaxen based XPath Abstract Syntax Tree. The Jaxen sax-type XPath parser is used to parse an XPath into a Tree. The tree can then be analyzed for various parts.
